thread.title_full: Jill and Jessa Duggar Talk Molestation Scandal in Promo for New TLC...

title: Jill and Jessa Duggar Talk Molestation Scandal in Promo for New TLC...
text:
Topix › Entertainment › Jill and Jessa Duggar Talk Molestatio... Jill and Jessa Duggar Talk Molestation Scandal in Promo for New TLC... Next Story Prev Story 9 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
The '19 Kids and Counting' sisters return to the network in the three-part special, 'Counting On,' which chronicles their lives as they move on from the sexual abuse scandal involving their brother. In a new promo for their new TLC special Counting On , Jill and Jessa Duggar recall what they felt when it was revealed last spring that their brother Josh molested them and three other girls when he was a teenager. Start the conversation, or Read more at Hollywood Reporter.
